gifting.description: Five matte lures in macaron colors, presented in a luxury gift box. Perfect for the angler who appreciates beauty.

story.paragraph1: For too long, fishing has been defined by conquest. XYRA was born to tell a different story.
story.paragraph2: We believe fishing is a ritual of healing. It is the quiet moment when the sun kisses the water. It is the gentle pull of the line that reminds us to breathe.
story.paragraph3: From our signature 'Flower-Resin Knobs' to our 'Blanc De Chine' finishes, every XYRA piece is sculpted to delight the senses. Designed for her hand, crafted for her soul.
